title: New technology creates AI romantic partners for users
description: As artificial intelligence continues to advance, some are now turning to technology to fill the void, engaging in friendships and sometimes romances with AI chatbots. NBC News’ Jake Ward explores the new frontier of modern relationships.

title: Federal judge rejects Tennessee drag show ban as unconstitutional
description: A federal judge has ruled that Tennessee’s law restricting drag performances in public or where children were present was unconstitutional.

title: Biden signs bipartisan debt ceiling bill to avert government default
description: President Joe Biden on Saturday signed into law a bill extending the debt ceiling for two years, averting a disastrous debt default ahead of Monday’s deadline.

title: California's earliest Black settlers bought land only for it to be stolen. Their descendants want it back.
description: Former slaves who came to California mined for gold and bought property, only for their land to be stolen or seized. Their descendants want a reckoning.

title: Hundreds killed in Indian train crash as officials say rescue efforts completed
description: NEW DELHI, India —Rescuers ended a search for survivors as the death toll from a train crash that killed more than 260 people and injured hundreds more in one of the worst rail disasters in Indian history, officials said.

title: Younger people left this U.S. territory for better jobs. Who takes care of the seniors?
description: Puerto Rico is aging faster than most places and older adults and seniors lack caregivers as younger Puerto Ricans left for jobs in the U.S. mainland.

title: Here's what's going on with Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton's impeachment
description: Everything you need to know about the imperiled Republican's upcoming corruption trial.

title: She thought her mom's drinking may have killed her — then a convicted murderer confessed, Austin police say
description: Sonia Houston wasn't sure what had killed her mother four years ago.
